description: If you've had your heart broken but you have not fully healed, then this course is for you. During this course, you will learn strategies and practical techniques using energy healing to mend your broken heart. Whether you're single or in a relationship, the material is equally as powerful. You will have access to training and guidance videos, MP3 downloads plus a workbook. You can begin implementing the techniques immediately. When done fully, the course should only take you 7 days to complete. There are 9 videos with Ingrid Darragh who will  take you step-by-step through the healing process. Having a broken heart is difficult at best. So why prolong it when you can mend it rapidly, easily and comfortably?
title: How to Mend a Broken Heart
